abstractText: In the original published article, an error was introduced in a table note under Table 1 and Table 2 and has since been corrected. The table note for Table 1 and Table 2 in the original published article read, “Bold rows reflect studies with overlapping samples”, but should have read, “Adjacent bold rows reflect studies with overlapping samples.” That is, study samples from Dauber (2004), Alkalay (2006) and Hogue et al. (2006) are overlapping, and study samples from Shelef et al. (2005) and Diamond et al. (2006) are overlapping. The original article has been corrected. sections.heading: Correction: Determinants and Outcomes of the Therapeutic Alliance in Treating Justice‑Involved Youth: A Systematic Review of Quantitative and Qualitative Research
sections.text:
Nina Papalia1,2  · Ashley Dunne1 · Natasha Maharaj1 · Erika Fortunato1 · Stefan Luebbers1,3 · James R. P. Ogloff1
Accepted: 26 August 2022 / Published online: 8 September 2022 © The Author(s) 2022

sections.heading: Correction to: Clinical Child and Family Psychology Review
sections.text:
https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s10567- 022- 00407-2
In the original published article, an error was introduced in a table note under Table 1 and Table 2 and has since been corrected. The table note for Table 1 and Table 2 in the original published article read, “Bold rows reflect studies with overlapping samples”, but should have read, “Adjacent bold rows reflect studies with overlapping samples.” That is, study samples from Dauber (2004), Alkalay (2006) and Hogue et al. (2006) are overlapping, and study samples from Shelef et al. (2005) and Diamond et al. (2006) are overlapping. The original article has been corrected.

title: Correction: Determinants and Outcomes of the Therapeutic Alliance in Treating Justice-Involved Youth: A Systematic Review of Quantitative and Qualitative Research
